name: ssun
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wo(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2)), wss(c0, cun(c1, c2)))

stmt.origin: jaoi(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2), wss(c0, cun(c1, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wo(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2)), wss(c0, cun(c1, c2)))

-| wi(wss(c0, c2), wss(c0, cun(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:

comment: A condition that implies inclusion in the union of two classes. (Contributed by NM, 23-Nov-2003.)
